snippet: Eliot Spitzer started airing the first negative television ad of the campaign for comptroller, saying Scott M. Stringer cut a “back-room deal” to allow Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg to run for a third term.
abstract: Eliot Spitzer started airing the first negative television ad of the campaign for comptroller, saying Scott M. Stringer cut a “back-room deal” to allow Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg to run for a third term.

headline.main: The Ad Campaign: Spitzer Attacks Stringer on Term Limits
